action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon makes three Rend attacks.

action.name: Rend
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 10 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) Slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) Poison damage.

action.name: Nightmare Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 14}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 22 ({@damage 4d10}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition until the end of the dragon's next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.
